summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for Conference Room Booking API. All core functionality working with 92.9% success rate. Minor error handling issues identified.

error_handling_issues.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error instead of 404 for non-existent room IDs
error_handling_issues.impact: Poor error handling for client applications
error_handling_issues.details: RoomNotFoundError should be caught and converted to 404 response

error_handling_issues.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error instead of 404 for non-existent room IDs
error_handling_issues.impact: Poor error handling for client applications

passed_tests: List rooms (/api/rooms) - found 5 rooms including 3 pre-seeded
Idempotency key functionality - same booking returned for duplicate requests
Get booking by ID with caching (/api/bookings/:id)
Conflict detection - returns 409 for overlapping bookings
Data validation - returns 400 for invalid booking data
Rate limiting and security headers working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix error handling in RoomService and BookingService to return proper HTTP status codes (404 instead of 500) for not found errors. Update error middleware to properly map domain exceptions to HTTP status codes.
